ow.routing.chord
クラス Chord

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.impl.AbstractRoutingAlgorithm
      ow.routing.linearwalker.LinearWalker
          ow.routing.chord.AbstractChord
              ow.routing.chord.Chord
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
RoutingAlgorithm
public final class Chord
extends AbstractChord

A Chord implementation which updates routing table gradually by stabilization. This algorithm is described in Figure 7 in the Chord paper "Chord: A Scalable Peer-to-peer Lookup Service for Internet Applications".

メソッドの詳細

stop

public void stop()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Stops this instance. This method is called by RoutingService#stop() and an application usually does not have to call this method directly.

定義:
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm 内の stop
オーバーライド:
クラス LinearWalker 内の stop
